description: Every Aussie has their own take on a potato bake. My favourite is a mix of potato and sweet potato, with cream cheese, onion, bacon and yummy cheese.
name: Potato Bake With A Twist Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180 C fan forced. Grease your baking dish with butter or cooking spray, approx 30cm long.
